DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamic effect ( 24-hours plasma cortisol area curve , plasma cortisol pre post ACTH stimulation , dehydroepiandrosterone sulphate ( DHEAS ) , osteocalcin 24 hour urine cortisol ) AZD5423 follow administration single multiple ascend dos healthy male Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics After Single Multiple Dosing AZD5423 Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
